channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MS

item.title: Report X-2024040531
item.description:
Report X-2024040531

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-18T18:14:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-04
  • City: BELDEN
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Driver noticed box was tore and powder was leaking from package DescribePack: plastic bucket is cracked and broke on bottom DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: hazmat was removed from work area and placed in proper hazmat hold area . Proper PPE and in house cleanup

  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Box came to QA wet, when opened 1/12 bottles had a failed closure. Package Was then placed in yellow tub awaiting disposition.. DescribePack: 1/12 bottles closure failed. DurationRel: -1 and MitigateEffect: no leakage other than fiberboard box becoming wet, was brought to QA and placed in yellow tub awaiting disposition.
